title: Remote-Based Mobile Language Leadership Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: No prior language learning experience, but holds organizational management experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized courses operating in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments, necessitating learner interaction and real-time feedback systems.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve basic language proficiency by completing microlearning modules three or more times per week in a mobile environment
Learners can collaborate with peers to complete two or more weekly projects using digital collaboration tools
Learners can receive personalized feedback through a remote education support system at least once per month

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
